languages.text:
The Overseer chooses two cells with the maximum distance between them equal to {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells. The second cell must be unoccupied. The Cyber-Eagle rushes from the first targeted cell to the second one and deals twice its weapon damage to all enemies on its path. Bleeding enemies also make AGI Save -{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}. On a failure, they are {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} for 1 round. The Cyber-Eagle then lands in the second cell. While flying, the Cyber-Eagle doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses two cells with the maximum distance between them equal to {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells. The second cell must be unoccupied. The Cyber-Eagle rushes from the first targeted cell to the second one and deals twice its weapon damage to all enemies on its path. Bleeding enemies also make AGI Save -{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}. On a failure, they are {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} for 1 round. The Cyber-Eagle then lands in the second cell. While flying, the Cyber-Eagle doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает две клетки на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} друг от друга (вторая должна быть свободной). Киберорел приземляется в первую, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, и мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося удвоенный урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути. Если на такого врага действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, он выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленным{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, birbirlerine en fazla {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} kadar uzakta bulunan iki hücre seçer. İkinci hücre, boş olmalıdır. Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselme{/g} etkisini kaybederek birinci hücreye iner ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana silah hasarının iki katını verir. Bu düşmanlardan herhangi birinde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} varsa −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlarlar{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, birbirlerine en fazla {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} kadar uzakta bulunan iki hücre seçer. İkinci hücre, boş olmalıdır. Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselme{/g} etkisini kaybederek birinci hücreye iner ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana silah hasarının iki katını verir. Bu düşmanlardan herhangi birinde kanama varsa −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde yavaşlarlar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Bu hareket, fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, birbirlerine en fazla {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} kadar uzakta bulunan iki hücre seçer. İkinci hücre, boş olmalıdır. Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselme{/g} etkisini kaybederek birinci hücreye iner ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana silah hasarının iki katını verir. Bu düşmanlardan herhangi birinde kanama varsa −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde yavaşlarlar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Bu hareket, fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne deux cases à une distance maximale de {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cases l'une de l'autre. La deuxième doit être inoccupée. Le cyber-aigle atterrit sur la première case, perd l'effet {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Vol{/g}, puis fonce sur la deuxième case en ligne droite, en infligeant deux fois les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage. Si l'un de ces ennemis est sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}, sans quoi il est {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenti{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant sélectionne deux cases à une distance maximale de {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cases l'une de l'autre. La deuxième doit être inoccupée. Le cyber-aigle atterrit sur la première case, perd l'effet {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Vol{/g}, puis fonce sur la deuxième case en ligne droite, en infligeant deux fois les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage. Si l'un de ces ennemis est sous l'effet de Saignement, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}, sans quoi il est ralenti pendant 1 round. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'attaques d'opportunité.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt zwei Felder im maximalen Anstand von {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} Feldern voneinander. Das zweite Feld muss unbesetzt sein. Der Cyber-Adler landet im ersten Feld, verliert den Effekt {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Aufgestiegen{/g}, sprintet in einer geraden Linie zu dem zweiten Feld und verursacht bei jedem Gegner auf seinem Weg doppelten Waffenschaden. Falls diese Gegner mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} belegt sind, müssen sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} bestehen, sonst werden sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher wählt zwei Felder im maximalen Anstand von {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} Feldern voneinander. Das zweite Feld muss unbesetzt sein. Der Cyber-Adler landet im ersten Feld, verliert den Effekt {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Aufgestiegen{/g}, sprintet in einer geraden Linie zu dem zweiten Feld und verursacht bei jedem Gegner auf seinem Weg doppelten Waffenschaden. Falls diese Gegner mit Blutung belegt sind, müssen sie eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} bestehen, sonst werden sie 1 Runde lang verlangsamt. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine Gelegenheitsangriffe.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}はお互いから{uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}セル以内の2つのセルを選択する。2つ目のセルは空いていなければならない。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに着陸し、{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}効果を失い、一直線に2つ目のセルに突進することで、進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージの2倍を与える。これらの中に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}状態の敵がいれば、−{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こさない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督者はお互いから{uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}セル以内の2つのセルを選択する。2つ目のセルは空いていなければならない。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに着陸し、{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}効果を失い、一直線に2つ目のセルに突進することで、進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージの2倍を与える。これらの中に出血状態の敵がいれば、−{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間スロウになる。この移動は機会攻撃を引き起こさない。

監督者はお互いから{uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}セル以内の2つのセルを選択する。2つ目のセルは空いていなければならない。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに着陸し、{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}効果を失い、一直線に2つ目のセルに突進することで、進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージの2倍を与える。これらの中に出血状態の敵がいれば、−{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間スロウになる。この移動は機会攻撃を引き起こさない。

Киберорел приземляется в первую, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, и мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося удвоенный урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути. Если на такого врага действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, он выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленным{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель выбирает две клетки на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} друг от друга (вторая должна быть свободной). Киберорел приземляется в первую, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, и мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося удвоенный урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути. Если на такого врага действует кровотечение, он выполняет проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} и в случае провала оказывается замедленным на 1 раунд. Это движение не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

Надзиратель выбирает две клетки на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} друг от друга (вторая должна быть свободной). Киберорел приземляется в первую, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, и мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося удвоенный урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути. Если на такого врага действует кровотечение, он выполняет проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} и в случае провала оказывается замедленным на 1 раунд. Это движение не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择两个格子，两个格子之间距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。随后，生化猎鹰会降落在第一个格子处，失去{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成双倍武器伤害。如果此次攻击命中了处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人，则目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}减值，否则就会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 监察官选择两个格子，两个格子之间距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。随后，生化猎鹰会降落在第一个格子处，失去{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成双倍武器伤害。如果此次攻击命中了处于流血状态的敌人，则目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78}减值，否则就会陷入减速状态，持续一轮。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona dos casillas con una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} casillas entre ellas. La segunda debe estar vacía. La ciberáguila aterriza en la primera casilla, perdiendo el efecto {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda casilla, infligiendo el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido. Si alguno de esos enemigos sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects two cells within {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} cells from each other. The second cell must be unoccupied. The cyber-eagle lands at the first cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect and dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing twice its weapon damage to each enemy in its path. If any of those enemies are {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor selecciona dos casillas con una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} casillas entre ellas. La segunda debe estar vacía. La ciberáguila aterriza en la primera casilla, perdiendo el efecto {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda casilla, infligiendo el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido. Si alguno de esos enemigos sufre hemorragia, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} o quedar ralentizado durante 1 asalto. Este movimiento no provoca ataques de oportunidad.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona dos celdas en un radio de {uip|PetsMP|d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7} celdas entre sí. La segunda casilla debe estar desocupada. El águila cibernética aterriza en la primera casilla, perdiendo el efecto de vuelo {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g} y se dirige a la segunda casilla en línea recta, infligiendo el doble de daño de arma a cada enemigo que encuentre en su camino. Si alguno de esos enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}sangra{/g}, debe superar una prueba de Resistencia a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de -{uip|PetsPER|c367824c9c6e4f7188e35f6e2755bd78} o queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
